channel.title: CVE Feed for TOBESOFT -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TOBESOFT -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7806|2024-08-04T09:41:01.865Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform
item.description: Tobesoft Xplatform 9.2.2.250 and earlier version have an arbitrary code execution vulnerability by using method supported by Xplatform ActiveX Control. It allows attacker to cause remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-7820|2024-08-04T09:41:01.879Z -- tobesoft -- nexacro14%2F17%20excommonapiv13
item.description: Nexacro14/17 ExtCommonApiV13 Library under 2019.9.6 version contain a vulnerability that could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code by setting the arguments to the vulnerable API. This can be leveraged for code execution by rebooting the victim’s PC

item.title: CVE-2020-7857|2024-08-04T09:41:01.893Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform
item.description: A vulnerability of XPlatform could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary command. This vulnerability exists due to insufficient validation of improper classes. This issue affects: Tobesoft XPlatform versions prior to 9.2.2.280.

item.title: CVE-2020-7821|2024-08-04T09:41:01.859Z -- tobesoft -- nexacro14%2F17%20excommonapiv13
item.description: Nexacro14/17 ExtCommonApiV13 Library under 2019.9.6 version contain a vulnerability that could allow remote attacker to execute arbitrary code by modifying the value of registry path. This can be leveraged for code execution by rebooting the victim’s PC

item.title: CVE-2020-7866|2024-08-04T09:41:01.891Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform
item.description: When using XPLATFORM 9.2.2.270 or earlier versions ActiveX component, arbitrary commands can be executed due to improper input validation

item.title: CVE-2020-7815|2024-08-04T09:41:01.950Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform
item.description: XPLATFORM v9.2.260 and eariler versions contain a vulnerability that could allow remote files to be downloaded by setting the arguments to the vulnerable method. this can be leveraged for code execution. File download vulnerability in ____COMPONENT____ of TOBESOFT XPLATFORM allows ____ATTACKER/ATTACK____ to cause ____IMPACT____. This issue affects: TOBESOFT XPLATFORM 9.2.250 versions prior to 9.2.260 on Windows.

item.title: CVE-2020-7825|2024-08-04T09:41:01.874Z -- tobesoft -- miplatform%20320%2C%20320u%2C%20330%2C%20330u
item.description: A vulnerability exists that could allow the execution of operating system commands on systems running MiPlatform 2019.05.16 and earlier. An attacker could execute arbitrary remote command by sending parameters to WinExec function in ExtCommandApi.dll module of MiPlatform.

item.title: CVE-2020-7853|2024-08-04T09:41:01.855Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform
item.description: An outbound read/write vulnerability exists in XPLATFORM that does not check offset input ranges, allowing out-of-range data to be read. An attacker can exploit arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2020-7874|2024-08-04T09:41:01.982Z -- tobesoft -- nexacro14
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in NEXACRO14 Runtime ActiveX control of tobesoft Co., Ltd allows the attacker to cause an arbitrary file download and execution. This vulnerability is due to incomplete validation of file download URL or file extension.

item.title: CVE-2020-7841|2024-08-04T09:41:01.890Z -- tobesoft -- xplatform%20xplatformlib922.dll
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability exists in TOBESOFT XPLATFORM which could cause arbitrary .hta file execution when the command string is begun with http://, https://, mailto://
